message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'value_error' as follows:
type value_error =
  | UnboundVariable of ident 
  | TypeError 
  | DivisionByZeroError 
  | PatternMatchingError 
  | LHS
